bug.author: JTrantow
bug.summary: Tutorial C++ Interface is out of date
bug.description:
** Create Windows C++ project references incorrect directories.** Appears the Open3D directory structure has changed since the tutorial was written. Or maybe the tutorial is only appropriate from a different install method of Open3D??? To Reproduce Build Open3D from source. Follow the Create C++ Project/Windows Tutorial. Expected behavior Expected instructions on setting Open3D_DIR to be correct. "C:/open3d_install/CMake " should be changed to "C:/open3d_install/build/CMakeFiles". Environment (please complete the following information):
OS: Windows 10.0 Open3D version: 0.8.0 CMake 3.13.1 CVisualStudio 15.9.17 Is this remote workstation?: na How did you install Open3D?: build_from_source using visual studio

comments.comment: Documentation bug, not a coding bug.
Closed due to lack of interest.
